sentences.en: China is understandably preoccupied by its staggering internal challenges.
sentences.cn: 中国正把精力放在应对内部的巨大挑战上,这一点可以理解.

sentences.en: Doctors are understandably cautious about this new treatment.
sentences.cn: 医生对这个新疗法很谨慎是可以理解的.

sentences.en: He was an ambitious man, understandably so, but he lack tact.
sentences.cn: 他是个雄心勃勃的人, 这是可以理解的, 但他缺乏圆滑.

sentences.en: He was understandably a bit nervous, but I repeat, I excused myself.
sentences.cn: 他理解我的压力, 但是我重复, 我很抱歉.

sentences.en: Many entrepreneurs understandably fear such scrutiny: they hate standing out, lest their operations become the focus of an investigation.
sentences.cn: 可以理解，很多企业家都害怕这样的审查：他们不愿意站出来，以免他们的经营成为调查的重点。

sentences.en: Most organizations are, quite understandably, suspicious of new ideas.
sentences.cn: 大多数机构对新想法持怀疑态度，这不难理解。

sentences.en: People began to worry about him and understandably so.
sentences.cn: 人们开始担心起杰拉德来了,这是可以理解的.

sentences.en: Some parents, understandably, have a very hard time with this one. They may feel that anything their kids do is their business.
sentences.cn: 可以理解，有些家长要做到这一条不太容易，他们可能觉得任何孩子的事都是他们的事。

sentences.en: The American commander, Admiral Nimitz, was understandably join the battle.
sentences.cn: 美军司令海军上将尼米兹怠于出战,这是可以理解的. (副词分译)

sentences.en: The army, over - stretched and taking heavy casualties in Afghanistan, feels understandably aggrieved.
sentences.cn: 身疲力竭的军队在阿富汗遭遇了大量人员伤亡, 他们感到委屈也可以理解.

sentences.en: The duke is understandably proud of Lady Helen and her achievements.
sentences.cn: 公爵为海伦女士和她的成就感到自豪，这很容易理解。

sentences.en: The hotel are understandably coy about the incident.
sentences.cn: 酒店对那次事件不愿多说，这可以理解。

sentences.en: The resulting crossover between various specialties and issues is often muddled, understandably.
sentences.cn: 这个结果在不同种类的特别和出版交叉通常是混乱的, 不能明白的.

sentences.en: There will now be renewed calls for more regulation, and understandably so.
sentences.cn: 现在将重现出台更多监管的呼声, 这是可以理解的.

sentences.en: They were understandably disappointed with the result.
sentences.cn: 他们对结果感到失望是可以理解的。

sentences.en: Those Chinese scientists in Silicon Valley are understandably proud of their achievements.
sentences.cn: 这些在硅谷工作的科学家对他们取得的成就感到很自豪,这是可以理解的.

sentences.en: Understandably, the European Space Agency is twitchy about its investment.
sentences.cn: 想当然的, 欧洲太空总署对这项投资焦躁不安.

words.tran_cn: 可以理解的；可以了解的
了解的；聪明的；有理解力的
被充分理解的；心照不宣的
明白；懂得（understand的过去分词）；熟悉
